title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Community-Based Online Health Science Expert Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expertise in medical/legal/technical domains and college-level foundational mathematical literacy
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Apply core concepts of probability theory and statistics to real-world cases for health science data analysis
Collaborate with experts from other disciplines to solve health science problems using online collaboration tools
Mathematically represent and validate data-driven decision-making models by the end of the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
